data.name: FAST99_TELL_AND_COLLECT
data.value: sensitivity::tell(rvis_sensitivity_design, rvis_sensitivity_out) rvis_sensitivity_ignored <- capture.output(rvis_sensitivity_printed <- print(rvis_sensitivity_design)) rvis_sensitivity_measures <- cbind(rvis_sensitivity_printed, rvis_sensitivity_design$V, rvis_sensitivity_design$D1, rvis_sensitivity_design$Dt) colnames(rvis_sensitivity_measures) <- c("first", "total", "V", "D1", "Dt")

data.name: FMT_CREATE_FAST99_DESIGN
FMT_CREATE_MORRIS_DESIGN
data.value:
rvis_sensitivity_factors <- c({0}) rvis_sensitivity_r <- {1} rvis_sensitivity_binf <- c({2}) rvis_sensitivity_bsup <- c({3}) rvis_sensitivity_levels <- rep(as.integer({4}), length(rvis_sensitivity_factors)) rvis_sensitivity_grid_jump <- rep(as.integer({5}), length(rvis_sensitivity_factors))
rvis_sensitivity_design_{6:00000000} <- sensitivity::morris( factors = rvis_sensitivity_factors, r = rvis_sensitivity_r, binf = rvis_sensitivity_binf, bsup = rvis_sensitivity_bsup, design = list( type = "oat", levels = rvis_sensitivity_levels, grid.jump = rvis_sensitivity_grid_jump ) )

data.name: FMT_LOAD_DATA
